price: Kuma wãne ne mafi zãlunci daga wanda ya ƙirƙira ƙarya ya Jingina ta ga Allah, alhãli kuwa shĩ, anã kiran sa zuwa ga Musulunci? Kuma Allah bã Ya shiryar da mutãne azzãlumai.
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ وَهُوَ يُدۡعَىٰٓ إِلَى ٱلۡإِسۡلَٰمِۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
